column4: Problem: My mom's Ubuntu computer has frozen in that nothing in Unity/X responds to mouse clicks or keyboard events. Dead desktop. I can ssh into it and everything looks works well at the CLI. Suggestions for error seeking?
Take a llok into the Xorg.0.log in /var/log
No errors there. I can vnc into it, by the way, but the desktop it still dead to mouseclicks in vnc.  (Multiple reboots have been tried, of course)
